item.title: Problem 3265 Count Almost Equal Pairs I
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3265 Question You are given an array nums consisting of positive integers.

item.title: Problem 592 Fraction Addition and Subtraction
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 592 Question Given a string expression representing an expression of fraction addition and subtraction, return the calculation result in string format.

item.title: Problem 3216 Lexographically Smallest String After a Swap
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3216 Question Given a string s containing only digits, return the lexicographically smallest string that can be obtained after swapping adjacent digits in s with the same parity at most once.

item.title: Problem 3016 Minimum Number of Pushes to Type Word II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3016 Question You are given a string word containing lowercase English letters.

item.title: Problem 2053 Kth Distinct String in an Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2053 Question A distinct string is a string that is present only once in an array.

item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2678 Question You are given a 0-indexed array of strings details.

item.title: Problem 2096 Step by Step Directions From a Binary Tree Node to Another
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2096 Question You are given the root of a binary tree with n nodes.

item.title: Problem 726 Number of Atoms
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 726 Question Given a string formula representing a chemical formula, return the count of each atom.

item.title: Problem 297 Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 297 Question Serialization is the process of converting a data structure or object into a sequence of bits so that it can be stored in a file or memory buffer, or transmitted across a network connection link to be reconstructed later in the same or another computer environment.

item.title: Problem 1598 Crawler Log Folder
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1598 Question The Leetcode file system keeps a log each time some user performs a change folder operation.

item.title: Problem 1002 Find Common Characters
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1002 Question Given a string array words, return an array of all characters that show up in all strings within the words (including duplicates).

item.title: Problem 344 Reverse String
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 344 Question Write a function that reverses a string.

item.title: Problem 3110 Score of a String
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3110 Question You are given a string s.

item.title: Problem 2000 Reverse Prefix of Word
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2000 Question Given a 0-indexed string word and a character ch, reverse the segment of word that starts at index 0 and ends at the index of the first occurrence of ch (inclusive).
